title: Brand New! Fine Shopping At Your Fingertips, Downtown Views! Gated
posting_body: Live an unparalleled lifestyle that blends leisure with convenience in the heart of Fort Worth, Texas.
Adjacent to the Chisholm Trail Parkway.
Easy access to Downtown Fort Worth, the Hospital District, Texas Christian University and the Fort Worth Cultural District.
We have mix of living options - from townhomes and urban studio efficiency apartments to loft apartments.

This rental community features poolside grilling and entertainment areas, a well-equipped fitness center, with yoga room and Private terrace lounge featuring striking views of Downtown Fort Worth and the Trinity Trails.
Convenient access to over 40 miles of hike-and-bike trails along the Trinity River.
Residents will enjoy the high-end specialty stores and distinctive restaurants of The Shops at Clearfork and Neiman Marcus opening February 2017 that are only a few steps away.
